.. pyXFOIL Documentation

Welcome to pyXFOIL's documentation!
===================================
Easy and simple to use aerodynamic tool:

    from xfoil_tools import *
    find_coefficients(0)
    >>{'CD',}
Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
